scripts.build: tsx scripts/build-puzzles.ts && npm run install:esbuild && vite build -c vite.config-pwa.mts --outDir docs/webapp && npm run license && node scripts/copy-licenses.mjs
scripts.build:dev: npm run install:esbuild && vite build -c vite.config-pwa.mts --outDir docs/webapp-dev
scripts.test: npm run install:esbuild && npm run install:electron && vitest run
scripts.bench: npm run install:esbuild && npm run install:electron && vitest bench
scripts.test:ui: npm run install:esbuild && npm run install:electron && vitest --ui --coverage
scripts.electron:compile: npm run install:electron && tsc --project ./tsconfig.bg.json && tsc-alias && webpack --config-name preload
scripts.electron:compile-all: npm run compile && npm run electron:compile
scripts.electron:portable: npm run electron:pack && node scripts/build.mjs portable
scripts.license:commit: npm run license && git add . && git commit -m "license" || git diff
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run build:dev && git add . && git commit -m "release"
scripts.release:patch: npm run license:commit && npm version patch && tsx scripts/publish-release.ts && npm run docs && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm run license:commit && npm version minor && tsx scripts/publish-release.ts && npm run docs && npm run release
scripts.release:alpha: npm run license:commit && npm version preminor --preid alpha
scripts.release:beta: npm run license:commit && npm version preminor --preid beta
scripts.release:pre: npm run license:commit && npm version prerelease
scripts.release:stable: tsx scripts/publish-release.ts stable && npm run docs && git add . && git commit -m "update stable version"
scripts.server:exe: npm run server:build && pkg dist/server/server.js --target node18-win-x64 --output dist/bin/shogihome-server.exe
